rules.description: Change caps_lock to control if pressed with other keys, to escape if pressed alone.
Add Ctrl+Backward-Delete to Option+Delete (delete current word).
Change shift + delete to forward delete (rev 2)
Map Tab to Hyper when held
Toggle caps_lock by pressing left_shift then right_shift
Fn+h/j/k/l as Vim arrows && Fn+a/s/d as ⇧/⌥/⌘
